BIO

Currently working as Front-end developer Intern at IpserLab LLC. Graduated from George Mason University with Master's in Computer Science. Proficient in Java and front-end technologies. I have been studying computer science since last 10 years and ever since I won my first programming competition when I was 10, I have been passionate about coding and breaking complex problems down into smaller bits that can be solved.

IpserLab LLC

Front-end Intern

Designed the UI and built front-end part of the web app that generates quiz for sales and marketing research.
Developed using Bootstrap, AJAX, CSS, HTML and JavaScript.

George Mason University

My coursework included Software Testing, User Interface Design, Object Oriented Software Specification and Construction, Advanced Computer Graphics and Game Technologies, Database Systems, Wireless and Mobile Computing.
